author: AP
title: Celtics coach adjusting to NBA's virus-imposed stoppage
description: Celtics coach Brad Stevens says he’s only been out of his home a few times in the weeks since the coronavirus pandemic caused a shutdown of the NBA season
content:
BOSTON (AP) — Celtics coach Brad Stevens can only remember leaving his home on a few occasions over the past two weeks. 
It is part of the new status quo for coaches and players across the NBA since the coronavirus pandemic sparked a rolling shutdown of prof… [+3380 chars]
